scripts.build: npm run install && npm run build:cds && npm run build:ts && npm run cleanup:ts1 && npm run cleanup:ts2
scripts.cleanup:ts1: npx rimraf ../../code/gen/**/**/*.ts && npx rimraf ../../code/gen/**/**/**/*.ts && npx rimraf ../../code/gen/**/**/**/**/*.ts
scripts.build:all: npm run build:srv && npm run build:db-com && npm run build:router  && npm run build:api && npm run build:broker
scripts.build:srv: cross-env-shell pack build $IMAGE_PREFIX/aisaas-srv -p ../../code/gen/srv -B paketobuildpacks/builder:base -b paketo-buildpacks/nodejs -e BP_LAUNCHPOINT=./node_modules/@sap/cds/bin/cds-serve.js -e BP_NODE_RUN_SCRIPTS=
scripts.build:api: cross-env-shell pack build $IMAGE_PREFIX/aisaas-api -p ../../code/gen/api -B paketobuildpacks/builder:base -b paketo-buildpacks/nodejs -e BP_LAUNCHPOINT=./node_modules/@sap/cds/bin/cds-serve.js -e BP_NODE_RUN_SCRIPTS=
scripts.build:broker: cross-env-shell pack build $IMAGE_PREFIX/aisaas-broker -p ../../code/broker -B paketobuildpacks/builder:base -b paketo-buildpacks/nodejs -e BP_LAUNCHPOINT=./start.js
scripts.push:all: npm run push:srv && npm run push:db-com && npm run push:router && npm run push:api && npm run push:broker
